TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityFeedGatherer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code. SharePoint 2013 includes the following APIs for working with feeds: .NET client, JavaScript, REST, and server. See Work with social feeds in SharePoint 2013 to choose the API for your specific feed-related programming tasks. Represents the base class for all activity feed gatherers.

remarks.para: Each gatherer creates an object for itself. Only users who are administrators of the User Profile Service Application can use the methods in this class.

Docs.param: The location in the list where this method is to start committing items to the database.
The number of items to commit to the database.
Docs.summary: Commits a list of ActivityEvent objects to the database.

Docs.param: A dictionary consisting of owner record identifiers and ActivityEvent objects.
A list of ActivityEvent objects. The output of this method.
Docs.summary: Converts a dictionary consisting of owner record identifiers and ActivityEvent objects into a list of ActivityEvents that can be batch written to the database.

Public Shared Sub GetUsersColleaguesAndRights (am As ActivityManager, bulkRecordIds As List(Of Long), ByRef owners As Dictionary(Of Long, MinimalPerson), ByRef colleaguesOfOwners As Dictionary(Of Long, List(Of MinimalPerson)))

public: static void GetUsersColleaguesAndRights(Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ActivityManager ^ am, System::Collections::Generic::List<long> ^ bulkRecordIds, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<long, Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::MinimalPerson ^> ^ % owners, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<long, System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::MinimalPerson ^> ^> ^ % colleaguesOfOwners);

Docs.param: The ActivityManager associated with this gatherer.
A list of record identifiers for each owner to be returned.
A Dictionary to be populated with the record identifiers and MinimalPerson objects that represent each owner.
A Dictionary to be populated with the record identifiers and MinimalPerson objects that represent each colleague of all owners.
Docs.summary: Returns owners and colleagues as objects for the specified record identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void MulticastActivityEvents (Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityManager objManager, System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityEvent> eventsToTryToMulticast, System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<long,System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.MinimalPerson>> colleaguesOfOwners, out System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<long,System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityEvent>> eventsConsolidatedPerOwner);

.method public static hidebysig void MulticastActivityEvents(class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityManager objManager, class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityEvent> eventsToTryToMulticast, class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<int64, class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.MinimalPerson>> colleaguesOfOwners, [out] class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<int64, class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityEvent>>& eventsConsolidatedPerOwner) cil managed

Public Shared Sub MulticastActivityEvents (objManager As ActivityManager, eventsToTryToMulticast As List(Of ActivityEvent), colleaguesOfOwners As Dictionary(Of Long, List(Of MinimalPerson)), ByRef eventsConsolidatedPerOwner As Dictionary(Of Long, List(Of ActivityEvent)))

public: static void MulticastActivityEvents(Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ActivityManager ^ objManager, System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ActivityEvent ^> ^ eventsToTryToMulticast, System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<long, System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::MinimalPerson ^> ^> ^ colleaguesOfOwners, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<long, System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ActivityEvent ^> ^> ^ % eventsConsolidatedPerOwner);

Docs.param: The ActivityManager associated with this gatherer.
A list of ActivityEvent objects to multicast to colleagues of the event owners.
A dictionary containing the colleague identifier for each owner and the associated list of colleagues. Each colleague is a object.
A dictionary containing the record identifier for each owner and that owner’s ActivityEvent objects. This is the output of this method.
Docs.summary: Distributes the specified events to all colleagues of event owners.

remarks.para: Since this method creates new ActivityEvent objects for each specified colleague, these events need to be committed to the database. Use the CollectActivityEventsToConsolidate method to convert the eventsConsolidatedPerOwner parameter into a List and then pass that list to the BatchWriteActivityEvents method.
